_ngcontent-pnj-c124="">Unrestricted</i></span><!----><div _ngcontent-pnj-c124="" class="description">confirms that while predominantly rural areas have gone some way towards catching up, their level of development still remains significantly below the EU average … </div></div><div _ngcontent-pnj-c124=""><span _ngcontent-pnj-c124="" class="metadata ng-star-inserted">Type <strong
